metadata.mapbox:title: Color theme
metadata.mapbox:description: Switch between predefined themes or set a custom theme.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color theme
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom theme based on a look-up table (LUT).

metadata.mapbox:title: Light preset
metadata.mapbox:description: Switch between 4 time-of-day states: dusk, dawn, day and night.

metadata.mapbox:title: Place labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide place labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: Place labels color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for place labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: Administrative boundaries
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide administrative boundaries.

metadata.mapbox:title: Administrative boundaries color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for administrative boundaries.

metadata.mapbox:title: Commercial land use color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for commercial areas.

metadata.mapbox:title: Medical land use color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for medical areas.

metadata.mapbox:title: Education land use color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for education areas.

metadata.mapbox:title: Industrial & airport land use color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for industrial areas and airports.

metadata.mapbox:title: Greenspace color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for greenspaces such as forests, parks, and woods.

metadata.mapbox:title: Water color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for water.

metadata.mapbox:title: Land color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for land.

metadata.mapbox:title: Road labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide road labels including road shields.

metadata.mapbox:title: Road labels color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for road labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: Transit labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide transit labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: Motorways color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for motorway roads.

metadata.mapbox:title: Trunk roads color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for trunk roads.

metadata.mapbox:title: Other roads color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for other roads.

metadata.mapbox:title: Pedestrian paths
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide pedestrian roads, paths, and trails.

metadata.mapbox:title: Roads brightness
metadata.mapbox:description: Control how bright roads appear in dark styles.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide POI labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI density
metadata.mapbox:description: Set the density of POI labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: Fueling station mode
metadata.mapbox:description: Control the visibility of fuel and electric charging station POI labels. Default displays both types.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI background
metadata.mapbox:description: Set background shape for POI labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI color mode
metadata.mapbox:description: Use the default categorical colors or set a single custom color for POI labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for POI labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: Landmark icons
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide Landmark icons.

metadata.mapbox:title: Landmark icon labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide Landmark icon labels.

metadata.mapbox:title: All 3D objects
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide all 3D objects, including buildings, landmarks, and trees.

metadata.mapbox:title: 3D buildings
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide 3D buildings.

metadata.mapbox:title: 3D building facades
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide 3D building facades.

metadata.mapbox:title: Building color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for 3D & 2D buildings.

metadata.mapbox:title: 3D trees
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide 3D trees.

metadata.mapbox:title: 3D landmarks
metadata.mapbox:description: Show or hide 3D landmark buildings.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for place labels when setting highlight state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for place labels when setting select state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for building fill extrusion when setting highlight state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for building fill extrusion when setting select state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Font
metadata.mapbox:description: Set the text font family. The basemap uses Medium, Bold, Italic and Regular. Falls back to Arial Unicode MS if a weight is missing.

data.description: png or webp file extension must be used. height = -10000 + ((R * 256 * 256 + G * 256 + B) * 0.1)
data.name: Mapbox Terrain-DEM v1

data.description: External tileset used for production - Mapbox Landmark Icons v1
data.name: Mapbox Landmark Icons v1 - Production

metadata.mapbox:description: Above polygons (land, landuse, water, etc.)
Above lines (roads, etc.) and behind 3D buildings
Above POI labels and behind Place and Transit labels

metadata.mapbox:title: Points of interest
metadata.mapbox:description: A point of interest.

mapbox:states.doc: When `true`, hides the icon and text. Use this state when displaying a custom annotation on top.

mapbox:properties.name: name
mapbox:properties.doc: Name of the point of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: group
mapbox:properties.doc: A high-level category, like POI, airport, transit, etc.

mapbox:properties.name: class
mapbox:properties.doc: A broad category of point of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: maki
mapbox:properties.doc: An icon identifier, designed to assign icons using the Maki icon project or other icons that follow the same naming scheme.

mapbox:properties.name: transit_mode
mapbox:properties.doc: Mode of transport served by a stop/station. Expected to be null for non-transit points of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: transit_stop_type
mapbox:properties.doc: A type of transit stop. Expected to be null for non-transit points of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: transit_network
mapbox:properties.doc: A rail station network identifier that is part of specific local or regional transit systems. Expected to be null for non-transit points of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: airport_ref
mapbox:properties.doc: A short identifier code of the airport. Expected to be null for non-airport points of interest

metadata.mapbox:title: Place labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Points for labeling places including countries, states, cities, towns, and neighborhoods.

mapbox:states.doc: When `true`, hides the label. Use this state when displaying a custom annotation on top.
When `true`, the feature is highlighted. Use this state to create a temporary effect (e.g. hover).
When `true`, the feature is selected. Use this state to create a permanent effect. Note: the `select` state has a higher priority than `highlight`.

mapbox:properties.name: class
mapbox:properties.doc: Provides a broad distinction between place types.

metadata.mapbox:title: Buildings
metadata.mapbox:description: Featureset describing the buildings.

mapbox:states.doc: When `true`, the building is highlighted. Use this state to create a temporary effect (e.g. hover).
When `true`, the building is selected. Use this state to create a permanent effect. Note: the `select` state has a higher priority than `highlight`.

mapbox:properties.name: group
mapbox:properties.doc: A high-level building group like building-2d, building-3d, etc.

metadata.mapbox:title: Landmark Icons
metadata.mapbox:description: Icons for landmark buildings

mapbox:properties.name: name
mapbox:properties.doc: Name of the Landmark in local language.

mapbox:properties.name: name_en
mapbox:properties.doc: Name of the Landmark in English.

mapbox:properties.name: short_name
mapbox:properties.doc: Short name of the Landmark in local language.

mapbox:properties.name: short_name_en
mapbox:properties.doc: Short name of the Landmark in English.
